title: Major lag on league but net is fine
body:
^ having major ping problems but I can use browser email etc yet league is continuously lagging

Edit:
I ran a repair league now works fine maybe a faulty file?

replies.body: Aww, I thought I may have been able to help you

I've got the same problem, can watch videos and download things fine. But halfway through a ranked game my ping just went to 300+ and stayed there T.T and it's still doing it 
So don't know if this is just a coincidence that we're both getting crap ping or if there really is something wrong

Could be your fps, otherwise its this random problem I also get where you have 20 ping 60 fps then 2 sec delays, which I suspect is to do with the game because I have good internet and a high performance computer

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hyvAW9vp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-25T02:06:47.095+0000)
>
> Could be your fps, otherwise its this random problem I also get where you have 20 ping 60 fps then 2 sec delays, which I suspect is to do with the game because I have good internet and a high performance computer

I have 120 base fps on med settings and around 60 ping and I can be running youtube Skype call/curse in the background and get no lag

I use Telstra, works perfectly well (most of the time) a high performance computer (I max it 60 fps probs should unlimit but meh) and it has awesome connection, can also have Skype curse all that going on and be fine (one in the same) but yet still get those moments of lag where pings don't respond and of the such (e.g. a brief moment last night when I was ganking akali mid and then pings and movement all lagged for a brief moment)

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hyvAW9vp,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-03-25T02:18:55.774+0000)
>
> I use Telstra, works perfectly well (most of the time) a high performance computer (I max it 60 fps probs should unlimit but meh) and it has awesome connection, can also have Skype curse all that going on and be fine (one in the same) but yet still get those moments of lag where pings don't respond and of the such (e.g. that brief moment last night when I was ganking akali mid and then pings and movement all lagged for a brief moment)

yeah I get those unexpected lag spikes that last for 1-2 secs but they don't happen often and when they do they don't stop me from doing what I was trying to do but yeah they are annoying when they happen.

> [{quoted}](name=sparklefart,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hyvAW9vp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-25T02:01:28.046+0000)
>
> Quit browser email etc

I was only opening it so I could check to see if it was lagging which it was not.
Quit everything and don't use telstra/dodo

> [{quoted}](name=sparklefart,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hyvAW9vp,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-25T02:11:50.785+0000)
>
> Quit everything and don't use telstra/dodo

Have to as Telstra is the only supplier where I live other wise I pay $50 for 3gb of internet

Are you sure its your ping and not your fps?
Could also be you are to far away from router

> [{quoted}](name=sparklefart,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hyvAW9vp,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-25T02:22:31.841+0000)
>
> Are you sure its your ping and not your fps?
> Could also be you are to far away from router

yes its my ping my fps is running at 120+ and It keeps saying trying to reconnect.
No
Who is your internet with? If you grab a copy of WTFast, does it remove said issues?

> [{quoted}](name=shalexade,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hyvAW9vp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-25T01:59:38.739+0000)
>
> Who is your internet with? If you grab a copy of WTFast, does it remove said issues?

Telstra 
This is the first time its happened though and I've run checks on my internet so it seems to be a problem with league.
